text: An earthquake happened in Badghis Province, Afghanistan, on 17 January 2022. It left 26 people dead, and five injured. It was a 5.6 magnitude earthquake. The earthquake destroyed hundreds of homes in northwestern Afghanistan. ==Related pages== *June 2022 Afghanistan earthquake ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Asia Category:2022 earthquakes January earthquake Category:2020s earthquakes in Asia January 2022 earthquake Category:January 2022 events Category:Badghis Province
title: January 2022 Afghanistan earthquake
